StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: UPDATEFACULTY
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source: CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE GRUPO10.UPDATEFACULTY(pFacultyID IN NUMBER, pName IN VARCHAR2, pDean IN VARCHAR2) AS&lt;br/&gt;BEGIN&lt;br/&gt; UPDATE Faculty_table faculty&lt;br/&gt; SET faculty.name = pName,&lt;br/&gt; faculty.dean = pDean&lt;br/&gt; WHERE faculty.idFaculty = pFacultyID;&lt;br/&gt;END updateFaculty;
